title: Daddy Come Home For Dinner - Novel Updates
tags: Childcare   Cooking   Cute Children   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Pregnancy   Schemes And Conspiracies   Wealthy Characters
author: As If Dawn   Dawnesque
description:
With an old cellphone in hand, the Zhao family heir walks up to Ye Fei. 'You left this with me five years ago. Are you still not going to admit it?' 

Ye Fei has drawn the worst lot in life. Her father is a coward, her mother exploits her, and her older sister schemes against her. 

After having been manipulated into a pregnancy five years ago, never in Ye Fei's wildest dreams did she expect the father of her son to be a diamond bachelorâ€”adored all across the nation.>
